verses.text: \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w could|strong="H3915"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* commanded \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w bring|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w records|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*, \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bigthana \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w Teresh|strong="H8657"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w chamberlains|strong="H5631"\w*, \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H5592"\w*, \w who|strong="H8104"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w lay|strong="H7971"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Ahasuerus.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w dignity|strong="H1420"\w* \w hath|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*? \w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w There|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said, \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*? \w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* come \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w outward|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* speak \w unto|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* said \w unto|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5975"\w*, \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said, Let \w him|strong="H5975"\w* \w come|strong="H5288"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w man|strong="H3820"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*? \w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* said \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w To|strong="H6213"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w myself|strong="H3820"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* said \w unto|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H2001"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w For|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H2001"\w* man whom \w the|strong="H2001"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*,

\w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w which|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* useth \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w wear|strong="H3847"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w rideth|strong="H7392"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w which|strong="H5483"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w crown|strong="H3804"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w*:

\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w most|strong="H4428"\w* \w noble|strong="H6579"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w array|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* withal \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w horseback|strong="H5483"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w Thus|strong="H3602"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* hast \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w even|strong="H3651"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: \w let|strong="H3651"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* \w fail|strong="H5307"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w arrayed|strong="H3847"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w caused|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* \w through|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w Thus|strong="H3602"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w be|strong="H5892"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w came|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*. \w But|strong="H7725"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w hasted|strong="H1765"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, mourning \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w having|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w covered|strong="H2645"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w recounted|strong="H5608"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wife \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w befallen|strong="H7136"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5307"\w* said \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wife \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* hast \w begun|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w While|strong="H5750"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w talking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, \w came|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w chamberlains|strong="H5631"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* hasted \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* Esther \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w*.
